scripts.start: bankai start index.js --css [ -u sheetify-postcss ] --html [ --title 'Jonathan Haines' --head '<meta http-equiv="x-ua-compatible" content="ie=edge"><meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1"><meta name="description" content="Web Technology Consultant"><link type="text/plain" rel="author" href="//barrythepenguin.github.io/humans.txt" />'] --open
scripts.build: bankai build index.js . --css [ -u sheetify-postcss ] --html [ --title 'Jonathan Haines' --head '<meta http-equiv="x-ua-compatible" content="ie=edge"><meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1"><meta name="description" content="Web Technology Consultant"><link type="text/plain" rel="author" href="//barrythepenguin.github.io/humans.txt" />'] --optimize
